title: Watch: PM Modi on charm offensive at G20; shares laugh with Meloni, hugs world leaders
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's candid conversation with Italian PM Giorgia Meloni captured attention at the G20 Summit sidelines in Johannesburg. The Indian Prime Minister also shared warm embraces with other world leaders, including Brazil's President Lula da Silva. Modi's arrival was marked by a vibrant cultural welcome from a troupe and the Indian diaspora.

title: 'Will Rahul get msg?': BJP on Tharoor's Trump-Mamdani remark; calls Cong 'sore loser'
content: The BJP has questioned Rahul Gandhi's receptiveness to democratic cooperation after Shashi Tharoor lauded US political civility. Tharoor's post, advocating for post-election unity for national interest, drew a sharp retort from BJP spokesperson Shehzad Poonawala, who questioned if Gandhi would heed the message and avoid acting like 'sore losers'.

title: Dubai Tejas crash: Pilot Namansh Syal seen smiling with officials before tragedy ‚Äì video
content: An Indian Air Force Tejas fighter jet crashed during an aerobatic display at the Dubai Airshow on Friday, resulting in the death of pilot Wing Commander Namansh Syal. The aircraft reportedly failed to recover from a negative-G turn, plunging to the ground and erupting in flames. This marks the second crash of the Tejas fighter since its induction.

title: 'Aisa dalega toh... ': Captain Pant backs Kuldeep with cheeky message - watch
content: Rishabh Pant captained India on Day 1 of the second Test, his vocal encouragement from behind the stumps becoming a highlight.  Viral stump-mic moments captured his active role in motivating bowlers and setting the tone.  Despite South Africa reaching a strong position, Pant's energetic leadership offered a glimpse into his captaincy style, balancing instinct and calmness.

title: Jeff Bezos to Amazon workers: Won't last without this skill; AI can't replace it
content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos stresses that innovation is key to thriving at his company. He seeks candidates who can invent solutions, not just follow rules. This focus on original thinking is vital in today's job market, especially with AI advancements. Bezos believes that failure and invention go hand-in-hand, essential for progress. His philosophy highlights adaptability and creative problem-solving as critical for both individuals and businesses to succeed in a changing world.

title: Greater Noida: Woman jumps to death from 16th floor apartment
content: A 21-year-old woman, Shalu from Muzaffarnagar, tragically died after allegedly jumping from the 16th floor of a Greater Noida residential building on Friday evening. The incident occurred at Migsun Twin Society, with police stating no suicide note was found and investigations are ongoing.

title: 'Did 8 peace deals': Trump repeats role in India-Pakistan ceasefire
content: US President Donald Trump again claimed credit for easing India-Pakistan tensions, stating he brokered peace deals and that PM Modi assured him of no war. India, however, consistently dismisses third-party mediation, with the conflict stemming from Operation Sindoor following a deadly attack. Trump's claims come as he met with New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani.

title: ‚ÄòRivals closing in‚Äô: Altman warns of Google, Anthropic push - what memo to ChatGPT employees said
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman acknowledged Google's AI advancements could temporarily impact the company, but expressed confidence in catching up.  Despite ChatGPT's user engagement cooling, Altman urged employees to focus on achieving superintelligence, emphasizing OpenAI's strength to navigate competition from rivals like Google and Anthropic, even as Google benefits from cloud services.

title: Ashes: Chasing Tendulkar's all-time record, Root flops again in Australia
content: Joe Root endured a disappointing start to the Ashes 2025 in Perth, failing to score in the first innings and managing only eight in the second, with Mitchell Starc claiming his wicket on both occasions. Despite his stellar career record, Root has historically struggled in Australia. Travis Head's century secured an eight-wicket victory for Australia in the first Test.

title: IND vs SA: Jaiswal scripts history with a unique record
content: Yashasvi Jaiswal's remarkable Test career continues with a unique record of never playing on the same ground twice. From his debut century in Dominica to recent double hundreds against England, he has consistently adapted to diverse conditions. Despite a recent struggle in South Africa, Jaiswal's impressive statistics highlight his potential.

title: 'Babri foundation in WB on Dec 6': TMC MLA says mosque will take '3 yrs to complete'
content: A TMC MLA's announcement to lay a foundation stone for a "Babri Masjid" in West Bengal's Murshidabad on December 6 has sparked controversy. The BJP has slammed the move as "appeasement politics," while the Congress has distanced itself, emphasizing governance issues. This is not the first time the MLA has made such a statement.

title: Gmail training AI on your emails: Viral claims spark; Google fights back
content: Google vehemently denies claims of scanning Gmail for AI training, labeling reports as misleading. A spokesperson clarified that existing smart features, like predictive text, are separate from Gemini's AI development.  While these features personalize user experience, Google insists they don't feed into AI models.  Despite the company's reassurances, a class-action lawsuit alleges privacy violations, and some users report smart features mysteriously re-enabling, fueling ongoing concerns.

title: Labour rules revamped! What all do new codes cover? All you need to know
content: India's central government has notified comprehensive labour reforms under four new Labour Codes, consolidating 29 existing laws. These changes extend benefits to fixed-term, contract, gig, platform, and women workers, ensuring equal pay and expanded work opportunities. The reforms also introduce a national floor wage and simplify compliance for businesses.

title: 'Under immense pressure': Another BLO found dead in Bengal; suicide note recovered
content: A Booth Level Officer in West Bengal's Nadia district was found dead by suicide, with her family citing immense work-related stress. This follows a similar incident in Jalpaiguri and prompts Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee to urge the Chief Election Commissioner to pause the ongoing electoral process in Bengal due to concerns for lives and the exercise's legitimacy.

title: Shrimp exports shift: India gains in non-US markets amid Trump tariffs
content: India's shrimp exports surged 18% to $2.43 billion in the first five months of FY26, driven by markets beyond the US.  Exporters are successfully diversifying their global reach, with Vietnam, Belgium, China, and Russia showing significant gains.  Despite facing higher US tariffs, early shipments to America saw a mild improvement, though a slowdown is anticipated.

title: Delhi air pollution: GRAP measures revised, stricter curbs imposed; all you need to know
content: The Central Pollution Control Board has revised the Graded Response Action Plan for Delhi-NCR following Supreme Court observations on deteriorating air quality. The updated plan, effective from November 2025, introduces stricter measures for each stage, including power supply guarantees, traffic management, public transport augmentation, staggered office timings, and work-from-home mandates to combat pollution.

title: T20 World Cup 2026: India, Pakistan placed in same group again - reports
content: India faces a smoother path in the T20 World Cup group stages, grouped with Pakistan and lower-ranked nations. Co-hosts Sri Lanka, however, are in a tougher pool with Australia and Zimbabwe. Other strong teams like England, West Indies, South Africa, and New Zealand also have challenging draws, promising an exciting tournament ahead.

title: Shashi Tharoor praises Trump-Mamdani meeting; calls it 'how democracy should work'
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor lauded the meeting between Donald Trump and Zohran Mamdani, highlighting it as a democratic ideal of post-election cooperation for national interest. Tharoor expressed a desire for similar bipartisan engagement in India. The meeting, despite past animosity, focused on New York's pressing issues like housing and affordability.

title: With employers unresponsive, Indian youth in UK form national career success council
content: Indian students in the UK now have a dedicated body, the Indian National Students Employability Council (INSEC), formed by INSA UK and Creoo. This initiative aims to tackle declining job prospects by moving beyond discussions to concrete actions like national roadshows and research.

title: 'Captains' Smriti Mandhana, Palash Muchhal face off in cricket match - watch
content: Smriti Mandhana and Palash Muchhal's pre-wedding festivities included a lively cricket match between 'team bride' and 'team groom,' with Mandhana's side emerging victorious. This playful contest followed a vibrant Haldi ceremony and a romantic proposal at DY Patil Stadium, all leading up to their wedding on the 23rd of November.

title: 4 early warning signs of colorectal cancer that appear in poop
content: Colorectal cancer is a serious health issue, affecting more young people. Early detection is vital for survival. Changes in stool, like thinness, mucus, or blood, can be warning signs. Persistent changes in bowel habits also require attention. Lifestyle factors contribute to the rising risk. Prompt medical evaluation is essential.

title: After Enrique concert, mobiles, gold chains stolen at Travis Scott concert in Mumbai
content: Travis Scott's Mumbai concert at Mahalaxmi Racecourse saw a wave of thefts, with fans reporting the loss of jewellery and mobile phones valued at over Rs 18 lakh. The Tardeo police have registered a case against unknown individuals and are investigating, reviewing CCTV footage to identify and apprehend the culprits responsible for the spree of thefts amidst the thousands-strong crowd.

title: Maha 'suicide' shocker: Slapped by her grandma over studies, teen jumps to death
content: A 13-year-old student tragically died after jumping from her school's terrace in Jalna. The incident occurred shortly after her grandmother reprimanded her for academic performance and allegedly slapped her. Police are investigating the circumstances surrounding the student's death, with an accidental case registered.

title: Harman Sidhu passes away at 37 in road accident
content: The Punjabi music industry is mourning the untimely loss of beloved artist Harman Sidhu, who tragically passed away at the age of 37 due to a catastrophic car accident in Mansa district. His vehicle collided forcefully with a truck, claiming his life instantly.

title: ISI-linked arms racket busted: 10 foreign pistols, 92 live cartridges seized; smuggled from Pak
content: Delhi Police have busted an international arms smuggling ring with suspected ISI links, arresting four individuals. Sophisticated foreign-made weapons, including Turkiye-made PX-5.7 pistols, were seized, having been smuggled via drones from Pakistan. This significant operation aims to dismantle a network intending to destabilize the region.

title: 'An oversight‚Äô: Al-Falah University's 1st reaction to NAAC notice
content: Al Falah University admitted an "oversight" regarding outdated accreditation on its website, removing the information after a NAAC show-cause notice. This follows an Enforcement Directorate probe into alleged financial irregularities, with the group's chairman arrested. Investigators suspect siphoning of funds, with crores generated from education receipts allegedly diverted to family-linked entities.

title: ‚ÄòFelt like a burden‚Äô: NRI couple says shift from US to India brought ‚Äòpeace of mind‚Äô ‚Äî viral video
content: A viral Instagram video shows a US-based couple explaining why they moved to India after 17 years. The woman says motherhood, short maternity leave and rising healthcare costs made life stressful. She says India offered quicker care, easier access to doctors and stronger support, giving their young family more balance and peace of mind.

title: Ex-CIA officer mocks Imran‚Äôs PTI over apology demand; asserts Pak can‚Äôt beat India in war - watch
content: Former CIA officer John Kiriakou claims Pakistan demanded an apology for his assessment of a conventional war with India. He also alleged the US "purchased" then-President Musharraf and that the Pentagon controlled Pakistan's nuclear arsenal in 2002. Kiriakou recounted Osama bin Laden's escape into Pakistan and stated India had the right to retaliate after terror attacks.

title: India‚Äôs exports hold steady amid Trump tariffs; new markets offset US slowdown
content: India's merchandise exports showed steady growth, reaching $220 billion in H1 FY26 despite global volatility. While the US remains a key market, its share has decreased, with India diversifying its export destinations. The government is providing significant assistance to exporters facing challenges like US tariffs.

title: Cardiologist reveals no 1 morning habit triggering heart attacks within 10 minutes
content: Cortisol, as we know is the stress hormone, that can raise blood pressure and heart during mental or emotional stress. The cortisol surge lowers heart rate variability. Dr. Heigl, showed data from continuous ECG monitors: in patients with cardiac events, heart rate variability dropped sharply within minutes of waking

title: 'World will cease to exist without Hindus': RSS chief Bhagwat speaks in Manipur; quotes Iqbal
content: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat stated that the world wouldn't exist without Hindus, citing the community's enduring identity. During his visit to Manipur, he urged unity and character-building for peace, emphasizing solutions within the constitutional framework and dialogue based on oneness. Bhagwat also acknowledged historical roots of regional tensions in colonial policies.

title: LiAngelo ball goes platinum with breakout hit ‚ÄúTweaker‚Äù featuring Drake
content: LiAngelo Ball, formerly a basketball player, has achieved a major milestone in music. His debut single 'Tweaker' has gone platinum. This success signifies a significant crossover from sports to the entertainment industry. The song became a cultural phenomenon, embraced by sports teams and charting highly. Ball's journey redefines his public identity and highlights his artistic ambition.

title: Sabrina Carpenter snubs Swift‚Äôs Marvel debut to plan wedding with Travis Kelce
content: Pop culture is abuzz as Sabrina Carpenter reportedly meets with Marvel for the Dazzler role, reigniting debate over Taylor Swift's potential casting. Fans long envisioned Swift as the music-powered mutant, citing her stage presence and pop icon status. While Carpenter offers a fresh take, Swift's connection to Dazzler remains a captivating 'what if' for many.

title: Bank holiday today: Are banks open or closed on November 22? Check details
content: Bank branches nationwide are closed today, Saturday, November 22, 2025, as it is the fourth Saturday of the month, a uniform holiday for banks. Customers needing branch services should plan for the next working day, as digital services and ATMs remain operational for essential transactions.

title: Jaipur school suicide: Student sought teacher's help 5 times, says CBSE report
content: A Jaipur school faces a CBSE show-cause notice after a Class 4 student died by suicide, reportedly due to 18 months of classroom bullying. The inquiry found the school failed to act on repeated complaints, with the class teacher ignoring the child's distress in her final moments. Safety lapses and a non-responsive grievance mechanism were also highlighted.

title: Watch: Passenger cooks noodles in train in electric kettle; Railway fumes
content: A passenger's viral video of cooking instant noodles in an AC coach using a household electric kettle has prompted Central Railway to take action. The railway authorities identified the social media user and will initiate proceedings under the Railways Act for misusing railway property and posing a fire hazard.

title: Revealed! 'That was on me': Jitesh explains choice to bench Suryavanshi in Super Over
content: India A captain Jitesh Sharma accepted responsibility for their semi-final loss to Bangladesh in the Rising Stars Asia Cup. The controversial decision to not bat Vaibhav Suryavanshi in the Super Over backfired, with Jitesh and Ashutosh dismissed for golden ducks. Despite a strong start and a late surge, India A narrowly missed out on a tie, ultimately falling short.

title: 'Fascist, jihadist next to each other?' Trump-Mamdani grilled at WH meet - watch viral moment
content: In a surprising turn, US president Trump and NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani met cordially, discussing shared goals for the city's affordability and safety. Despite past animosity, they focused on housing and utility costs, with Trump even defending Mamdani against accusations. This unexpected dialogue signals a potential shift in their relationship.

title: Manipur crackdown: Four militants arrested; men linked to banned groups carried out extortion
content: Security forces in Manipur have apprehended four militants from banned groups involved in extortion activities. The arrests, made in Thoubal and Imphal West districts, led to the recovery of weapons, ammunition, and incriminating documents. These operations are part of ongoing efforts amidst the state's persistent ethnic violence.

title: ‚ÄòClothes torn‚Äô: Marine engineer‚Äôs wife ‚Äòstrip-searched‚Äô at Lucknow shop
content: A marine engineer's wife was allegedly assaulted, strip-searched, and publicly humiliated at a Lucknow crockery shop after being accused of theft. She filed an FIR against the shop owner, his family, and employees. The shopkeeper has filed a counter-allegation, claiming the woman and a companion stole plates.

title: CGBSE class 10, 12 exam 2026 time table released: Check complete schedule here
content: Chhattisgarh Board has announced the 2026 Class 10 and 12 exam schedule. Practical exams are set for January, with theory papers commencing in February. Class 12 exams begin February 20th, followed by Class 10 on February 21st. Students are urged to download the official PDF for precise details and prepare diligently.

title: Flagg outduels HS teammate Queen in career night
content: Cooper Flagg got a measure of revenge against former high school teammate Derik Queen, scoring 12 of his career-high 29 points in the fourth quarter to lead the Mavs to a 118-115 win over the Pelicans.

title: UVA shooter given max penalty of 5 life sentences
content: A judge sentenced Christopher Darnell Jones Jr. to the maximum allowable penalty of five life sentences, plus 23 years, for shooting and killing three Virginia football players in 2022.

title: Kiffin decision coming day after Egg Bowl, AD says
content: An announcement about Lane Kiffin's future will come the day after No. 6 Ole Miss plays rival Mississippi State in the Egg Bowl in Starkville on Nov. 28.

title: Stephen Jones: Pickens benched for missing bus
content: Cowboys receiver George Pickens missed the team bus to Monday's game against the Raiders, leading to him getting benched, co-owner and COO Stephen Jones told Dallas' 105.3 The Fan on Friday.

title: Source: 49ers voided Aiyuk's guarantees for 2026
content: During training camp, the 49ers voided the guaranteed money receiver Brandon Aiyuk has in his contract for 2026 because he had not been meeting the requirements of that deal, a league source said Friday, confirming a report by The Athletic.

title: Norris takes pole in wet Las Vegas qualifying
content: Lando Norris' march toward a first world title continued apace Friday after he took pole position in a wet and perilous qualifying session at the Las Vegas Grand Prix while his teammate Oscar Piastri could manage only fifth.

title: Franklin gets 5-year, $41.75M+ deal with Hokies
content: James Franklin's contract with Virginia Tech will net the Hokies' new coach at least $41.75 million over the next five years, according to a term sheet released by the school Friday.

title: Records: WMU police called twice to aid Kneeland
content: Western Michigan University police were twice called to perform welfare checks on former Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland while he played for the school.

title: üèà Reid's debut rankings for 2026 NFL draft
content: Jordan Reid unveils his initial rankings for the 2026 draft class, with the top 50 players, scouting reports and standouts at every position.

title: Clarity or more chaos? Breaking down the key games of Week 13
content: A Big Ten showdown in the West, playoff hopefuls trying hang on and the potential to clear things up in the ACC.

title: NBA Cup takeaways: Late-night drama unfolds in the West
content: The 2025 NBA Cup continued group play Friday. Here's everything you need to know about the third annual in-season tournament.

title: North Texas' QB guru can make a star out of anyone, even a player who was a high school backup
content: Eric Morris has tutored QBs from Patrick Mahomes to Cam Ward and John Mateer. How he mentors them is key to their successes and his.

title: The wild rise of BYU's Bear Bachmeier
content: Bachmeier has impressed with his talent and toughness, two traits honed through years of family battles.

title: NBA first-month lessons: What we're hearing on all 30 teams
content: Tim Bontemps takes the pulse of the league on OKC's chase for 70 wins, the potential post-Trae Hawks and more first-month standout storylines.

title: Pete Alonso's three most aggressive suitors so far -- and a few other fits for the free agent first baseman
content: For a second straight winter, the Mets' franchise home run king is seeking a long-term deal. Where might he land?

title: Should the Tigers trade Tarik Skubal? We asked around MLB
content: Will the best pitcher in baseball be on the move this offseason? Those in the game offer their advice.

title: Our guide to every Week 12 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: Another Eagles-Cowboys classic? Will Christian McCaffrey run through the Panthers? We have picks, stats and more for every game.

title: What makes Sarah Strong so good? The seven traits she shares with former UConn stars
content: Stewie's dominance. Taurasi's confidence. Collier's efficiency. UConn's Sarah Strong has all that -- and more.

title: NHL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, each team's quarter-season MVP
content: The Avalanche's reign atop the list continues, and the Blackhawks break into the top 10. Here's the full list.

title: Grading preseason bold predictions for all 32 NHL teams
content: Some of our wild takes from September don't look so wild anymore. Others are way off base. Here's an update.

title: Early offseason needs for all 32 NFL teams: Positions to upgrade, draft prospects to watch, more
content: How can all 32 NFL teams improve during the offseason? We took an early look at positional needs, free agents to watch and intriguing draft fits.

title: Laurens' weekend preview: Derbies galore with Arsenal vs. Spurs, plus NWSL Championship
content: It's Friday and a full weekend of action awaits across the soccer calendar. So who better to tee up the best matches than Julien Laurens? In a new weekly feature, he picks out the best of the action ahead.

title: WNBA mock draft: There's a new No. 1 replacing Lauren Betts at the top
content: Four UCLA players, including Lauren Betts, are now projected first-round picks. But Spain's Awa Fam is No. 1.

title: Last-minute pickups for Week 12: Target the Brissett-Wilson combo in Arizona
content: If bye weeks or injuries have you seeking lineup help, consider the Cardinals passing game and a sneaky defense.

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 12
content: An all-encompassing look at matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores.

title: Wetzel: Is the NCAA infraction system now too speedy to be fair?
content: In an effort to speed up infractions rulings, the NCAA implemented a new system in 2023 for low-stakes cases.

title: USC-Oregon: Why to bet on the Ducks' defense to prevail in Eugene
content: No. 7 Oregon is nearly a double-digit favorite at home against No. 15 USC, and the Ducks matchup up well against the Trojans' style of offense.

title: Expert picks, best bets: How Tsarukyan can reenter title contention
content: MMA experts give their predictions for a UFC Fight Night from Doha, Qatar, headlined by lightweight contenders Arman Tsarukyan and Dan Hooker.

title: How Mbapp√©'s start at Real Madrid compares to greats like Ronaldo, Benzema
content: Kylian Mbapp√© has reached 75 games at Real Madrid in his best form since joining them. How does his start compare to some of the club's greatest strikers?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona eye Kane, √Ålvarez as Lewa replacement
content: Barcelona have lined up Harry Kane and Juli√°n √Ålvarez as potential replacements for 37-year-old striker Robert Lewandowski. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Michigan State, other men's No. 1 class contenders, 5-star intel, more
content: Teams that won (Michigan State) and have work to do (Kentucky), plus the latest on uncommitted five-stars.

title: Union Minister's Big Charge Against DK Shivakumar Amid Karnataka Tussle
content: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi alleged that Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah and Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar are indulging in the purchase of MLAs amid the escalating leadership strife in the state.

title: US Court Orders Byju's Founder To Pay Over $1 Billion After Default Ruling
content: A US bankruptcy court has ordered Byju's founder Byju Raveendran to pay over $1.07 billion, holding him personally liable for the movement and concealment of funds from Byju's Alpha, the company's US-based financing arm.

title: Stricter Anti-Pollution Rules For Delhi Amid Dip In Air Quality
content: Stricter pollution curbs are expected to kick in soon to tackle the worsening air quality in Delhi and nearby regions with the onset of winter.

title: MK Stalin Seeks PM Modi's Intervention Over Tamil Nadu Metro Proposal
content: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin has sought Prime Minister Narendra Modi's intervention over the Metro Rail Proposal for Coimbatore and Madurai districts. In a letter to Modi, Stalin said he was ready to meet him, explaining the matter.

title: US State Reports First Death From A Rare Strain Of Bird Flu H5N5
content: The person from Grays Harbor County, about 78 miles (125 kilometers) southwest of Seattle, had a backyard flock of domestic poultry that had been exposed to wild birds, health officials said.

title: Over 300 Students, Teachers Kidnapped From Nigerian School, Second Such Incident This Week
content: The number of boys and girls kidnapped from St Mary's is almost half of the school's student population of 629.

title: Gautam Adani's Rs 100-Crore Vision To Secure India's Civilizational Future
content: Industrialist Gautam Adani has outlined a Rs 100-crore initiative to revitalise India's educational landscape and protect its civilisational memory.

title: Adversaries To Allies: Changing Trump-Mamdani Bond Post White House Meet
content: The Republican president and New York City's Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani were warm and friendly, speaking repeatedly of their shared goals to help Trump's hometown rather than their combustible differences.

title: Bengaluru Cash-Van Heist Cracked: 3 Arrested, Rs 5.76 Crore Recovered
content: The robbery that took place on Tuesday involving a CMS-operated cash vehicle carrying Rs 7.11 crore was found to be a well-planned insider-assisted heist.

title: Bengal Poll Officer Found Dead, Family Says Stress Over Voter Roll Revision
content: A woman working as a Booth Level Officer was found dead in West Bengal's Nadia, with her family claiming that she was under tremendous work stress due to the Special Intensive Revision exercise.

title: Shashi Tharoor's Post On Trump-Mamdani Meet Gets BJP Thumbs-Up
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor has praised US President Donald Trump's meeting with newly elected New York mayor Zohran Mamdani at the White House as upholding democratic spirit despite making fierce attacks against each other during the polls.

title: Made In China, Turkey, Supplied To India Via Pak: Major Arms Racket Busted
content: The gang, linked to Pakistan's Inter-Services Intelligence (ISI), was smuggling high-end pistols from Pakistan into India using drones.

title: Fearing Transfer, Officer Attempts Suicide In Siddaramaiah's Constituency
content: Divya, a grade-1 panchayat secretary collapsed at her office after allegedly consuming nearly 15 tablets, including Paracetamol, a pain relief and fever medicine.

title: "No One Could Believe It": Witness To NDTV On Tejas Jet Crash At Dubai Air Show
content: A Tejas fighter jet crashed during an aerial display at the Dubai Air Show, killing the lone pilot, Wing Commander Namansh Syal.

title: Tejas Air Crash 2025: A Look Back At Air Show Disasters Worldwide
content: A Tejas fighter jet crashed on Friday afternoon during a highspeed aerial demonstration at the Dubai Air Show. The crash occurred at the AI Maktoum International Airport at 2:10 pm, killing the pilot, Wing Commander Namansh Syal, aged 34.

title: 20 Crore Laddoos Made With Spurious Ghee During 2019-24: Tirupati Official
content: An estimated 20 crore laddoos were prepared using adulterated ghee at the revered Tirupati shrine, authorities have said, even as a probe continues into the impurities found in the temple prasad.

title: Cigarettes, Marijuana Stuffed Inside Banana Stems Found In Karnataka Prison
content: The central prison in Karnataka's Shivamogga saw a crackdown on narcotics on Friday. Officials seized 123 grams of marijuana and dozens of cigarettes.

title: Donald Trump Jr, Girlfriend Dance To Bollywood Song At Udaipur Wedding
content: A moment that truly took the spotlight was Ranveer Singh getting Donald Trump Jr and his girlfriend to groove to his hit number "What Jhumka?" from Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani.

title: Terror Doctor's Big Confession, New Revelations In Delhi Blast Conspiracy
content: The probe into the Delhi blast case has exposed a nefarious plan by the Jaish-linked white-collar terror module to carry out blasts across several Indian cities.

title: "I'll Go When You Go": Jimmy Kimmel On Donald Trump's Call For His Resignation
content: In a Truth Social post, US President Donald Trump called Jimmy Kimmel "a man with no talent and very poor television ratings" and urged the network to "get the bum off the air."

title: Rain to gain strength in south, central Kerala; yellow alert for four districts on November 22
content: Thiruvananthapuram recorded the highest amount of rainfall during the last 24 hours ending at 8.30 a.m. on Saturday

title: Commission for Air Quality Management makes GRAP more stringent in Delhi-NCR amid worsening air quality
content: Under the new framework, several curbs that previously fell under Stage II ('Poor' AQI 201-300) will now be enforced at Stage I

title: Low pressure area formed in Bay of Bengal: IMD
content: The weather office also said that the system (possible depression) is likely to move westnorthwestwards and is very likely to intensify further over southwest Bay of Bengal during subsequent 48 hours

title: Webinar to examine air quality and its impact on lung health to be held on November 23
content: The webinar will address how deteriorating air quality is impacting lung health, examining its role in rising respiratory illnesses, reduced lung function, long-term airway damage, and increased vulnerability in children and older adults, while also discussing preventive measures and clinical guidance

title: Subba Reddy refutes reports alleging use of adulterated ghee in 20 crore Tirupati laddus
content: Condemning the reports, former TTD chairman Subba Reddy expressed his resolve to fully cooperate with the SIT which was investigating the case

title: Delhi traffic police imposes over ‚Çπ84 crore as fine during GRAP checks from Oct. 14 to Nov. 18
content: The senior officer emphasized that the force remains "fully alert across all ranges and will continue strong enforcement of GRAP restrictions so that traffic remains smooth and pollution sources are reduced through the winter season."

title: Irrigation Advisory Council guarantees water for 1.9 lakh acres in rabi season in Kakinada district
content: Erstwhile East Godavari Zilla Parishad chairman Vipparthi Venugopal, Kakinada Member of Parliament T. Uday Srinivas and MLAs also attended as members of the Irrigation Advisory Council

title: Amaravati as capital: Andhra Government trying to get Bill passed in Parliament, says Pemmasani
content: Pemmasani Chandra Sekhar said the proposal got legal clearance and the file was under consideration of the Home Ministry

title: Congress panel to meet on Nov. 23 ahead of alliance talks with DMK for 2026 Assembly polls
content: ‚ÄúWe will hold a meeting to chalk out the modalities for the talks with the DMK, and meet the DMK leaders next week,‚Äù Mr. Selvaperunthagai said

title: Two days after Bengaluru ATM van robbery, police recover ‚Çπ5.7 crore, arrest three
content: The accused had planned the heist three months ago and conducted recce to identify areas where there are no CCTV coverage

title: Exports clock fall in 14 months: CRISIL
content: The decline in exports was broad-based across petroleum products, gems and jewellery and core sectors

title: BLO found dead in Bengal's Nadia, family claims SIR work-related stress
content: Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has urged Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar to halt the ongoing SIR in Bengal

title: Arunachal CM Pema Khandu announces major digital overhaul of ILP to strengthen monitoring
content: Pema Khandu said the digital integration process has been under way for nearly three years and the project has now entered its final stage

title: BJP cancels membership of Yuva Morcha leader arrested for assaulting live-in partner in Kerala
content: Gopu Paramasivan, a native of Thevara, was arrested on Friday (November 21) after allegedly assaulting his live-in partner at their rented house in Vyttila

title: After Congress‚Äô initial ‚Äòsuspense‚Äô, Ravipuram division braces for high-stakes triangular contest
content: Ravipuram has traditionally been an impregnable stronghold of the party until sitting councillor and independent candidate S. Sasikala breached it in 2020

content: "Guwahati creates history! Proud to see Assam Cricket Association Stadium (ACA) Stadium become India‚Äôs 30th Test venue, bringing the pinnacle of cricket to Assam," Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma said

title: HC slams action against doctor for not standing on Haryana MLA's arrival in emergency ward
content: The court directed the Haryana authorities to issue a no-objection certificate (NOC) required by the petitioner doctor for pursuing a postgraduate medical course and imposed ‚Çπ50,000 as costs on the State

title: Unidentified woman found dead in Kochi; man seen sitting beside body detained
content: The police said it is suspected that George murdered the woman following a financial dispute and his attempt to abandon the body failed as he was allegedly drunk and too tired

title: TVK chief Vijay to resume public engagement with indoor, limited-access meet in Kancheepuram
content: He will address supporters in Kancheepuram district at 11 a.m. on Sunday; the meeting ‚Äî which comes nearly two months after the Karur stampede ‚Äî will be held indoors, and entry will be restricted to 2,000 registered participants

title: Electrification work begins at Subarnapur in Odisha following Mohan Charan Majhi‚Äôs direction
content: A day after the Chief Minister's direction, officials of the District Administration and personnel of Tata Power Southern Odisha Distribution Limited (TPSODL) visited the hamlet and started installation of around 30 electric poles and a 25-kva transformer

title: KRCL personnel reunite runaway boy with parents after he was seen without ticket on Mumbai-Mangaluru train
content: It was subsequently found that the child had been missing from his school in Vasco-da-Gama, Goa, and his parents had widely circulated information seeking help in tracing him

title: Kalaburagi study suggests a KMF-style cooperative cure for price volatility of vegetables
content: The study suggests a KMF-style overhaul of vegetable marketing; the model would allow vegetable farmers to sell directly to consumers, stabilise prices, and create a predictable market

title: In Kerala, a snakebite that sparked a change
content: Last month, Kerala declared snakebite envenomation a notifiable disease. Though snakebites are common in the State, a 2019 incident triggered a systemic overhaul. A 10-year-old girl had died of a venomous snakebite in a school in Wayanad, and people were outraged. Since then, a digital rescue network has been launched and school infrastructure upgraded.¬†Sarath Babu George¬†reports on Kerala‚Äôs quest for zero snakebite mortality

title: Demolition a political exercise in Varanasi, should be stopped, says Akhilesh

title: When faction terror reached Hyderabad with blood, gore and bombs

title: Delhi breathes very poor air on 16 of 21 days in November

title: How Baker Mayfield went from castoff to star: A wild 48 hours
